title: WordPress MCP Tool Extensions
description: WordPress-specific extensions to the MCP tool specification

type.description: WordPress tool type classification for CRUD operations and actions

rest_alias.description: Maps the tool to a WordPress REST API endpoint

method.description: HTTP method for the REST API endpoint

inputSchemaReplacements.description: Modifications to apply to the input schema derived from REST API

preCallback.description: PHP callable executed before the REST API call (string, array, or closure)

enabled.description: Whether the tool is currently enabled

tool_type_enabled.description: Whether this tool type is enabled in WordPress settings

disabled_by_rest_crud.description: Whether this tool is disabled due to REST API CRUD tools being enabled

has_rest_alias.description: Computed field indicating if the tool has a REST alias

permission_callback.description: PHP callable for checking tool permissions (string, array, or closure)

permissions_callback.description: Legacy alias for permission_callback (string, array, or closure)

callback.description: PHP callable that implements the tool functionality (string, array, or closure)
